item.title: Watson API + Twitter
item.description: Watson API (created by IBM) provided a huge amount of open source service for Artificial Intelligence. My very first application is to make the interaction between Watson and Twitter. Requirements Python modules: watson_developer_cloud, python-Twitter Accounts : Twitter (https://twitter.com/) , Watson (https://www.ibm.com/watson/) import sys import operator import requests import json import twitter from watson_developer_cloud import PersonalityInsightsV2 as PersonalityInsights Get data from Twitter First, we need to create a new app in https://apps.
